titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1998, the duty on certain electrical capacitors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/19/1995--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1997, the duty on certain electrical capacitors.
